description: a(n) = 2^x, where x = p*(p-1)/2 and p(n) = n-th prime.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,22
prog: (PARI) { n=0; forprime (p=2, prime(22), write("b061591.txt", n++, " ", 2^(p*(p - 1)/2)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 25 2009]
crossrefs: Cf. A007955, A006308. The exponents x are in A008837.
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 22 2001
extensions: OFFSET changed from 2,1 to 1,1 by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 25 2009
